casebody.data:
Ronald HILLMAN, an Individual, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; the Honorable Rob Bare, District Judge; and the Honorable Adriana Escobar, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Susan Proctor, an Individual; and Kay Medrano, an Individual, Real Parties in Interest. No. 77387 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 13, 2018

DENIED.
